author: rekovic
body:
92X - This PR is for Online DQM use in the TagCollector

This is 92x 2017 EMTF emulator (PR #20768) plus NoHackConditions (PR #20689)
with a caviat of allowing static config for new EMTF which also uses DB, but via Frontier and not via GT.  This is needed till the EMTF Forests are in the GT, which will happen once the big EMTF PR #20286 is merged into CMSSW.
title: 92x For Online DQM Use only - new EMTF emulator plus  L1T config from GlobalTag modulo EMTF
